docblock.description: Client that interacts with Imbo servers
docblock.long-description: This client includes methods that can be used to easily interact with Imbo servers.

docblock.description: Public key used for signed requests
Private key used for signed requests

tag.name: param
tag.description: One or more URLs to the Imbo server, including protocol

docblock.description: Generate an image identifier based on the data of the image
Generate a signature that can be sent to the server

tag.name: param
tag.description: The URL to send a request to

tag.name: param
tag.description: The URL to send a request to

tag.name: return
tag.description: Returns a string with the necessary parts for authenticating

docblock.description: Helper method to make sure a local file exists, and that it is not empty

tag.name: param
tag.description: The path to a local file

docblock.description: Get a predictable hostname for the given image identifier
Parse server host URLs and prepare them for usage

tag.name: param
tag.description: One or more URLs to an Imbo server

docblock.description: Return the current server URL's used by the client
Get the URL to the status resource
Get the URL to the current user
Get the URL to the images resource of the current user
Get the URL to a specific image
Get the URL to the metadata of a specific image
Add a new image to the server

tag.name: throws
tag.description: Throws an exception if the specified file does not exist or is of zero length

docblock.description: Add a new image to the server by using an image in memory and not a local path

tag.name: param
tag.description: The actual image data to add to the server

tag.name: throws
tag.description: Throws an exception if the specified image is empty

docblock.description: Add a new image to the server by specifying a URL to an existing image

tag.name: param
tag.description: URL to the image you want to add

docblock.description: Checks if a given image exists on the server already by specifying a local path

tag.name: throws
tag.description: Throws an exception if the specified file does not exist or is of zero length

docblock.description: Checks if a given image exists on the server already by specifying an image identifier
Delete an image from the server
Get the number of images currently stored on the server
Get an array of images currently stored on the server

tag.name: return
tag.description: Returns an array with images (can be empty)

docblock.description: Get the binary data of an image stored on the server
Get the binary data of an image stored on the server

tag.name: param
tag.description: URL instance for the image you want to retrieve

docblock.long-description:
This method returns an associative array with the following keys:

  • width: Width of the image in pixels
  • height: Height of the image in pixels
  • size: Size of the image in bytes
  • mimetype: The original mimetype of the image
  • extension: The original extension of the image

docblock.description: Generate an image identifier for a given file

tag.name: return
tag.description: The image identifier to use with the imbo server

docblock.description: Generate an image identifier based on actual image data

tag.name: return
tag.description: The image identifier to use with the imbo server

tag.name: return
tag.description: Returns an array with the server status

tag.description: The URL to generate the token for

docblock.description: Fetch the complete URL including optional query parameters
Get the complete URL as an URL-encoded string
Resets the URL - removes all query parameters
Method for adding query parameters to the URL

tag.name: param
tag.description: The name of the param. For instance "page" or "t[]"

tag.name: param
tag.description: The value of the param. For instance "10" or "border:width=50,height=50"

docblock.description: Magic call method that can be used to add simple query parameters to the URL
docblock.long-description:
This method must be implemented in such a fashion that users can call non-existing methods on the URL instance that will be added as query parameters.

$url = new ImboClient\Url\Images('http://imbo', 'publicKey', 'privateKey');
$url->page(2)->limit(10);

echo $url; // http://imbo/users/publicKey/images?page=2&limit=10

tag.name: param
tag.description: The method called (will be used as query parameter name)

tag.name: param
tag.description: Arguments to the method. The first argument will be used as query parameter value

docblock.long-description: This method should proxy to getUrl()

Returns the date on which the image was last updated

Returns the public key in which the image is cataloged under

docblock.description: POST some data to an URL

tag.name: param
tag.description: The metadata to POST. The data must be JSON-encoded

This class is a driver for the client using the cURL functions.
This method will make a request to $url with the current options set in the cURL handle resource.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Additional headers to send in this request as an associative array

docblock.long-description: If the cURL driver causes an error that ends in the client not being able to set a proper response this method must return null.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The HTTP status code to set

docblock.description: Get the optional imbo error code from the body
Whether or not the response is a success (in the 2xx range)
Whether or not the response is an error (> 4xx range)
Returns the image identifier associated with the response
docblock.long-description: If the response does not contain any image identitifer (for instance if the reguest made was against the metadat resource) NULL will be returned.

docblock.description: Return the body as an array
Return the body as an object
